page.title: 17POLITICS/GOVERNMENT-STURTON
page.content:
THE VILLAGE HALL IS THE POLLING STATION FOR{NATIONAL & LOCAL ELECTIONS THE AREA HAS BEEN MAINLY{CONSERVATIVE IN THE PAST BUT THERE IS NOW A SWING TO{LIBERALISM.}STURTON HAS A{PARISH {COUNCIL}OF 1O MEMBERS,MEETING MONTHLY TO DISCUSS & TAKE ACTION ON LOCAL ISSUES SUCH AS PLANNING APPLICATIONS MADE TO THE COUNTY COUNCIL BY LOCAL RESIDENTS & BUSINESSES.
THE{COUNTY & DISTRICT COUNCILS}PROVIDE A{MOBILE LIBRARY}FORTNIGHTLY,A{MOBILE {CHIROPODIST}(FOR PENSIONERS),{GRASS {VERGE CUTTING}AND A WEEKLY{REFUSE {DISPOSAL}SERVICE.{SNOW CLEARING & ROAD {GRITTING SERVICES}IN WINTER ARE EXCELLENT AS THE HIGHWAYS DEPARTMENT IS SITED ON THE EDGE OF THE VILLAGE. EMERGENCY{FIRE SERVICE}IS INITIALLY COVERED BY THE SAXILBY FIRE STATION 3 MILES AWAY.
